data.text: @drdina1 I see this with highly intelligent people with addictions. The mind is a powerful tool for good or ill.
@drdina1 @TaniaAMarshall exactly which is also evidenced by how many well educated people join cults too

"Woke"= indoctrinated. Those advocating these values use strong psychological manipulation tactics. They control a range of contexts to promote them. Yet the values don't bear up under scrutiny. The methodology supporting it is flawed or invented. The norms clash. It's a hot mess https://t.co/pKbgz9SMYK
